alerts.description: Suspicious file encryption pattern detected on endpoint ${ipAddress} (${endpointName}). High entropy files found, potentially ${malwareName}.

eventStream.message: Process ${malwareName} attempted unauthorized file modification on ${endpointName}.
Large encrypted file transfer detected from endpoint ${ipAddress}.

alerts.description: Multiple failed login attempts detected for user '${username}' on ${service} from IP ${ipAddress}.

eventStream.message: Failed login attempt for user '${username}' from IP ${ipAddress} on ${service}.
Anomaly detected: High volume of failed logins for user '${username}'.

alerts.description: Suspicious execution of '${processName}' with encoded commands by user '${user}' on ${ipAddress}.

eventStream.message: Process '${processName}' launched with suspicious arguments by user '${user}'.
Unusual outbound connection from ${ipAddress} to C2 server detected.

alerts.description: Unusual SMB activity from ${sourceIp} to ${destIp} with administrative share access to '${share}'.

eventStream.message: Multiple failed SMB connections from ${sourceIp} to ${destIp}.
Admin share '${share}' accessed from suspicious source ${sourceIp}.

alerts.description: Malicious attachment '${attachmentName}' detected in email from '${senderEmail}' to '${recipientEmail}'.

eventStream.message: Incoming email from '${senderEmail}' flagged for suspicious attachment.
Detonation report for '${attachmentName}' indicates malicious behavior.

alerts.description: Suspicious token manipulation by user '${username}' on system '${system}' involving process '${process}'.

eventStream.message: Access token duplication detected for user '${username}'.
Privilege level change for user '${username}' via '${process}' detected on '${system}'.

alerts.description: Unusual DNS query patterns and large data volume (${dataVolume}) from ${sourceIp} to '${domain}' indicating DNS tunneling.

eventStream.message: High volume of unusual DNS queries from ${sourceIp} to '${domain}'.
Suspected DNS tunneling activity detected from ${sourceIp}.

alerts.description: Unusual access and bulk download (${volume}) of sensitive data from '${dataShare}' by user '${username}'.

eventStream.message: User '${username}' accessed '${dataShare}' outside normal working hours.
Bulk download of ${volume} from '${dataShare}' by user '${username}' detected.
